articles.author: Dan Diamond, Lauren Weber
articles.title: White House embraces lab leak as ‘true’ pandemic origin, axes covid website - The Washington Post
articles.description: Most Americans blame a lab leak for the coronavirus pandemic, but it remains divisive in the intelligence community and is opposed by many virologists.
articles.content: The White House on Friday launched a website deeming a laboratory leak as the true origin of the coronavirus, embracing a theory that has become a popular explanation for a pandemic that has killed m… [+10494 chars]
